articles.author: Jody Godoy
articles.title: Ripple notches landmark win in SEC case over XRP cryptocurrency - Reuters
articles.description: Ripple Labs Inc did not violate federal securities law by selling its XRP token on public exchanges, a U.S. judge ruled on Thursday, a landmark legal victory for the cryptocurrency industry that sent the value of XRP soaring.
articles.content: July 13 (Reuters) - Ripple Labs Inc did not violate federal securities law by selling its XRP token on public exchanges, a U.S. judge ruled on Thursday, a landmark legal victory for the cryptocurrenc… [+4992 chars]
